name: Art of Stunt
description:
Falling from the roof of a skyscraper, climb perilous mountains, blaze through industrial landscapes, each of which poses a new challenge and provides the opportunity to perform wild stunts on your dirt bike.


Game Features:

1. Over 80 levels.
2. The motorbike controls are realistic and easy to pick up. You can perform some amazing jumps and flips.
3. You can complete some classic action stunts, including falling from the roof of a skyscraper, leaping over a valley on a motorcycle, driving through the glass wall of a building, etc.
4. With various bike types and enhanced features.

Complete the challenge like a stunt star. Try out the many stunt jump opportunities to collect award.
